Class Main

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
main.Main
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Main extends javafx.application.Application implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The Main controller. This class is the controller for the Main screen.
